sample menus

Seaside Catering caters for your individual requirements with a bespoke menu, the examples below will give some ideas and a flavour of what can be supplied.

fish

Prawn and slmon morany pie with delvilled mash

Crispy fish tacos with mango salsa

Sri Lankan-style fish curry

Crispy snapper with salsa verde risotto

Wood grilled salmon, mixed greens, tomatoes, San Saba Farms spiced pecans, jicama

chicken

Creamy, garlic tomato chicken skillet dinner with potatoes and kale

Barbecue chicken breast with romaine hearts tossed in green goddess dressing and grilled flatbread

Chicken pasta with spicy asiago cream sauce, applewood-smoked bacon, tomatoes, and spiced pecan green beans

Pineapple chicken; citrus seasoned kabob grilled with chile glaze

wood grilled chicken, mixed greens, blue cheese cumbles, spiced pecans, applewood-smoked bacon, and cucumbers

beef

Chile-crusted ribeye topped with Cajun butter

Filet mignon; center-cut, wrapped in applewood-smoked bacon

Wood grilled tenderloin, mixed greens, bleu cheese crumbles, diced tomatoes, and balsamic vinaigrette

Center-cut, sliced wood grilled sirloin, brandy peppercorn sauce, broccoli, and mashed potatoes

Slow roasted prime rib; encrusted with fresh herbs and pepper, hand-carved and served with homemade au jus, creamy horseradish sauce by request, choice of side

pork

Baby back ribs; slow-roasted and grilled, Java BBQ sauce, fresh fruit

Pork ribs with asparagus and lemony milk mushrooms

Jamaican-style pork chops with a scrumptious marinade of thyme, maple syrup and Worcestershire sauce

Zesty lemon pork fried golden and jazzed up with coconut, garnish this easy and fragrant curry with coriander leaves

Pork sorpotel cooked with cloves, onion and chili, your family and your taste buds will be oh so grateful.
